title: Person of Interest Season 5 - Trailer Finale HD
author: Real Scorsese
comment: That end still gets me. The hope. The humongous breath of hope..... followed by steep crippling heartbreak. The loss in his eyes.
i have no words, it's perfect. i miss this team so much
I loved this vedio, take me back 2 years age😔
